text:
Such a super convenient location!  The Butler River Trail quickly became my prime spot for running.  I could literally warm up walking from this house over there!

This intimate, cozy house is perfectly sized for couples and less.  Clean house, straightforward policies, well furnished, and safe!

I'd definitely consider this house again when I'm back in Austin!
title: Eastside Bungalow SXSW/dwntwn
